Agents Welcome to

  ONLINE-CSR™
Work Smarter not Harder
  
Our service is for medium to very large enterprises.  Your clients must be customers of the Regional Bell Operating Company (RBOC).  Currently the only RBOC we provide service for is Qwest.  The remaining RBOCs will be brought on board during 2003.

The RBOCs have a complicated way of billing their customers. They base their billing on Universal Service Order Codes (USOC).  If a customer currently wants their RBOC to provide them with a Customer Service Record (CSR) then they will receive a page of codes.  A CSR can only be read by specially trained phone company personnel. Even for these trained individuals it is still a laborious task to read this lengthy, coded CSR.  With ONLINE-CSR™ our proprietary software can read the CSR, summarize it, convert it to English, have an expert review it and post the results on our web site at a cost previously unobtainable.

Opportunity
The opportunity lies in every RBOC customer knowing exactly what they are being charged for, with someone other than their RBOC checking the CSR's for accuracy.  In the past this was a time intensive and expensive proposition.  Our first customer was a government entity being charged for telecom services in a building  demolished years ago. We have found that the first person who walks through the door and provides a client with a solution to a problem they have had for years, can win the business (almost) automatically.  By using ONLINE-CSR™ you will increase your commissions earned because the customer will be placing new orders with you instead of the RBOC.

Made for Agents
ONLINE-CSR™ was designed for agents and consultants.  The price of the service is set by the agent.  An agent will have a buy rate depending on the size (number of CSRs) of their client.  An agent can mark up the service to maintain a 50% commission, while a paid consultant may choose to offer the service at cost.  The agent has the choice to bill the client directly or have ONLINE-CSR™ bill them.  We offer three levels of service, you can determine which level is best for your company. The goal is to  generate more revenue for you as the agent.  

Build and Promote Your Business
ONLINE-CSR™ is a privately owned ASP.  We are not an agent for the RBOC competing against you. ONLINE-CSR™ was designed to be licensed by agents and consultants.  Each agent will have their own privately labeled entry page to the web site for their customers to view, listing your name as the contact person.  Each page of the web site will refer to your agency, and link to your web site.  Your agency is a licensed user of the software.  As far as your customer knows, it is your service.   If you are currently an agent placing your own orders for service with the Local Exchange Carrier (LEC)  this service will dramatically increase your orders and help your sub agents.  If you need a master agent to work through we can provide you with a list of larger, more secure, agencies.
